description.en:
Collection of short stories based on the Persona 4 game, made by various artists. 

Publisher: Hinotama

---
**Volume 1: It's SHOW TIME!**
**Cover**: Irikaki Tome (入垣トメ)
**Title page**: [Kawata Yuuko](https://mangadex.org/author/9225ca75-706d-4ef7-9703-655d83138dcb)
**Illustrations**: [Arii Memeko](https://mangadex.org/author/25e5594a-7ba2-45d7-8e22-41ed51f043b7), Masami Natsuno (匡見夏野), [Sumino Hirune](https://mangadex.org/author/cd572af7-556b-43d9-bccf-4766813fceed), [Hidaka Nami](https://mangadex.org/author/ec788694-7bef-4ec9-83dd-809ddc5c16d7)

**Volume 2: ZONE TIME**
**Cover**: [Kawata Yuuko](https://mangadex.org/author/9225ca75-706d-4ef7-9703-655d83138dcb)
**Title page**: [Igarashi Emi](https://mangadex.org/author/0dd7c7e4-ea8b-4259-8b0a-b1830ed8f1d2)
**Illustrations**: [Tsukiyama Ryuuji](https://mangadex.org/author/78b75fce-4fbc-45ea-9b2d-caf6486245cf), [Tonami Minato](https://mangadex.org/author/6581181e-9ba9-409b-9446-bf6970c04d29), [Ookami Wakana](https://mangadex.org/author/d6bc570a-84ad-41a8-ba30-7a6bedfa9454), [Tatsumi Jin](https://mangadex.org/author/97885011-ad73-4fe5-8aeb-b5c76f125533), [Mame](https://mangadex.org/author/d751e2c6-64dc-4fdd-80f3-bf08e36898b2), [Yanamoto Aisa](https://mangadex.org/author/36a85dbc-1072-4033-886b-b4e23e8e0bbf)

**Volume 3: WINTER Story**
**Cover**: Irikaki Tome (入垣トメ)
**Title page**: [Kirai Yuu](https://mangadex.org/author/26fbba43-6f31-4106-ae6a-37a12b6fb792)
**Illustrations**: [Hayase Reku](https://mangadex.org/author/e90a0f08-2264-4301-b0d2-f9c621a4ebc1), [Yanamoto Aisa](https://mangadex.org/author/36a85dbc-1072-4033-886b-b4e23e8e0bbf), [Sumino Hirune](https://mangadex.org/author/cd572af7-556b-43d9-bccf-4766813fceed),  [Tsukiyama Ryuuji](https://mangadex.org/author/78b75fce-4fbc-45ea-9b2d-caf6486245cf), [Itsuki Makoto](https://mangadex.org/author/8de6ea05-1a9c-4d56-9beb-92fc0cc56bfb), [Taihei Hiromi](https://mangadex.org/author/06f5362a-d2d4-471e-aaa1-2a4a03a8eed3)

**Volume 4: Nanako Carnival**
**Cover**: [Hayase Reku](https://mangadex.org/author/e90a0f08-2264-4301-b0d2-f9c621a4ebc1), [Mochizuki Kazuomi](https://mangadex.org/author/799f2bd1-3085-468c-8b7d-626ecf4d63be), [Inuyama Masato](https://mangadex.org/author/f84180e2-9866-474a-b5bf-441c0f56fbf3)
**Title page**: [Nishito Rei](https://mangadex.org/author/26f1c491-b48c-4549-822f-91270d4b4a87)
**Illustrations**: [Aoba Hayato](https://mangadex.org/author/91bf6094-50b4-413f-8808-c0a2b6abbf85), [Mikanagi Fubito](https://mangadex.org/author/b7db0914-034e-4aea-b237-e8d810110fe9), [Katou Michiru](https://mangadex.org/author/c749ff28-ad50-4a4a-8bc8-b5a5dfa10c5a), [Uraki Enya](https://mangadex.org/author/2ec5f3f4-e98a-4362-a329-83254120a04b), [Kirai Yuu](https://mangadex.org/author/26fbba43-6f31-4106-ae6a-37a12b6fb792), [Sakazaki Mei](https://mangadex.org/author/ecb49ad3-76aa-4c22-9ade-5b73218d460d)

biography.en:
**Alt names**:
Terakane Hibiki
寺鐘ひびき

**Alt names**:
Tahei Hiromi
太平洋海

**Alt names**:
まがみぐりこ
魔神ぐり子

Name in native language:
- 五十嵐愛美

**Alt names**:
Noda Bals
野田バルス

**Name In Native Language**: 一智和智

He's part of a duo with his wife [Yanamoto Aisa](https://mangadex.org/author/36a85dbc-1072-4033-886b-b4e23e8e0bbf) called [Bito Reki](https://mangadex.org/author/e4ab12aa-ad73-4ec0-b970-a9b53effd109).

**Alt names**:
西斗玲

- Kirai You
- Kirai Yu

-  喜来ユウ

Circles:
- OASISBOX

浦稀えんや

**Circles**:

- TOY-KING

**Alt names**:
やなもとあいさ

She's part of a duo with her husband [Ichitomo Kazutomo](https://mangadex.org/author/2207ecf5-bc3a-4b81-9dfa-9ff320786fd7) callled [Bito Reki](https://mangadex.org/author/e4ab12aa-ad73-4ec0-b970-a9b53effd109).
